```{r}
#| context: setup
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(ggthemes)
library(scales)
library(bslib)
library(bsicons)

cake_data_raw <- read.csv("../data/2025/scores_sheet_season_2.tsv", sep = "\t", header = T)
```

```{r}
#| label: prepare data

cake_data_filt <- cake_data_raw %>%
    mutate(cake_type = 
            ifelse(Chocolate == "yes" & Berries == "no" & Cheesecake == "no", "chocolate",
                ifelse(Berries == "yes" & Chocolate == "no" & Cheesecake == "no", "berries",
                    ifelse(Cheesecake == "yes" & Chocolate == "no" & Berries == "no", "cheesecake", NA))))
```
